title: On the 'Report a Bug' board
body:
~~My apologies if this isn't the right place to post this.~~

I was looking to report an in-game bug I ran into several times, but the '_Report A Bug_' board continually tells me I need to be Level Six in order to report one. In my mind, that implies Summoner Level 6; however I am currently Level 30 on my account. Is there a special leveling system for boards that I'm unaware of? I tried looking for information on it, but unfortunately there is a lot of unhelpful discussions that drowned out any that'd be useful.

Thank you for your time.

~A Silly Summoner

replies.body: Sometimes if you hadn't used your Boards account for a long time, it will have fallen out of sync with your Summoner profile. A discussion post like this is enough to have caused a sync and update your level, as it seems it has! Happy posting!
